channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-15661] Hook up JvmPauseMonitor metrics in Master
item.description: The regionserver metric source will get all jvm pause metrics where HMaster extends RegionServer, but we need to add a pause monitor and hook up its metrics to the master source in 0.98
item.summary: Hook up JvmPauseMonitor metrics in Master

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Attaching patch on top of the one for HBASE-15614. Won't apply until it goes in.

-1 overall
